data.persona: I need to see about the provisions for the castle for winter.  I wonder who the King is dallying with this week?  This bodice is too tight....I can't breathe.  This mead tastes stale.
data.description:
You are in the Kings chambers.
The large four poster bed is adorned with the finest linens that Europe has to offer.  Gold is liberally woven through the fabric of the duvet and the tassels that drape to the floor on each corner of the duvet.  A gauzy purple fabric hanging from the bed posts sets an opaque tone to the room.  One window is shuttered by large wooden planks that can be thrown open to allow the mid day light to illuminate the room.  A large chest of drawers holds a small portion of the King's clothing.
There's two planks, a King's clothing, a Tassel, an a gilded mirror, two large chest of drawers, a table, a duvet, two large four poster beds, a gauzy purple fabric, two windows, two Linens, and a Gold here.
The a royal prince is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "This room was designed by a team of the finest decorators in the kingdom, but it has been nicknamed the bloodbath, because the king put to death 3 designers for \"not meeting the standard set forth\". data.mid_motivation: I need to prove that the king is unfaithful to me
data.long_motivation: I want to stage a coup and take over as sole ruler before winter comes

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use gauzy purple fabric with mirror
